issue.title: [Doc][Cookbook] Appending Tables to an existing Table - R
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13728](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13728). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13728?focusedCommentId=17435197) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Closing this for now as there is currently no zero-copy way of doing this in the R package other than workarounds - this will be possible to do after ARROW-14414 is done and ConcatenateTables is exposed in R.
